information.left.deal: * Deal directly with the end user. No middlemen and no fees.
information.left.title: Makers
information.right.visualize: * Are you a hospital or nursing home manager interested in listing your PPE needs
information.right.title: Health Professionals
header.title: We connect health organizations with makers of critical equipment.
need.update.title: There’s a need for...
aboutus.vision.title: Our Vision
aboutus.vision.content: Mensageo is a platform for hospitals and elderly centers, who have a shortage of medical supplies and don't have a reliable way to communicate these needs to the people who can provide them. Our platform will connect individuals and organizations that want to make donations with the hospitals and elderly centers in need.
aboutus.whoarewe.title: Who are we?
aboutus.whoarewe.content: We are a group of people with diverse backgrounds seeking to contribute with hospitals and elderly centers around the world to get the protective personal equipment they need.
aboutus.contactus.title: Contact us!
aboutus.contactus.content: If you have any questions or suggestions please send us an email to mensageocov@gmail.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks!
joinus.title: Join Us
joinus.content: Please send an e-mail with your contact information to mensageocov@gmail.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks!
feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.content: Please send an e-mail with your feedback to mensageocov@gmail.com. Thanks!
email.form.text: In order for the hospital to be able to evaluate if your donation can be accepted or not, we kindly request you to include all the relevant information to this end, including if you hold any kind of certification or if you are using a model that has already been certified
email.form.title: Send Dialog
email.form.confirmation.ok: Your offer was sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks!
email.form.confirmation.error: We had a problem sending your offer, we apologize for any inconvenience. Please try again.
